patthana1.8:1.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:1.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe
patthana1.8:1.1_2: paṭicca dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā
patthana1.8:2.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:2.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:2.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.8:3.1_2: tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:3.1_3: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe
patthana1.8:4.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sukhasahagataṁ
patthana1.8:4.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.8:4.1_2: sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.

patthana1.8:5.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:5.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:6.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana1.8:6.1_1: hetupaccayā—sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca
patthana1.8:6.1_2: dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ
patthana1.8:6.1_3: khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:7.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— upekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana1.8:7.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.8:8.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—pītisahagatañca
patthana1.8:8.1_1: sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe
patthana1.8:8.1_2: paṭicca dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.8:8.1_3: paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:9.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—pītisahagatañca
patthana1.8:9.1_1: sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca
patthana1.8:9.1_2: eko khandho. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana1.8:9.1_3: sukhasahagatā dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.

patthana1.8:10.1_1: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana1.8:10.1_2: pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.8:10.1_3: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā
patthana1.8:10.1_4: ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:11.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … adhipatipaccayā
patthana1.8:11.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe natthi) āsevanapaccayā … (āsevane vipākaṁ natthi) kammapaccayā …
patthana1.8:11.1_4: vipākapaccayā … āhāra …pe… indriya … jhāna … magga … sampayutta … vippayutta … atthi
patthana1.8:12.1_0: Hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe dasa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe
patthana1.8:12.1_1: nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte
patthana1.8:12.1_2: vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbattha dasa.
patthana1.8:14.1: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:15.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:15.1_1: pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:16.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana1.8:16.1_1: nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā
patthana1.8:16.1_2: ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:17.1: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:18.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:18.1_1: sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:19.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana1.8:19.1_1: nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā
patthana1.8:19.1_2: ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:20.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:20.1_1: upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:20.1_2: Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe
patthana1.8:20.1_3: paṭicca eko khandho. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
patthana1.8:21.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:21.1_1: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā
patthana1.8:22.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:22.1_1: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:23.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca
patthana1.8:23.1_1: dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.8:23.1_2: paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:24.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (naadhipatipaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.8:25.1: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— pītisahagate khandhe paṭicca pītisahagatā cetanā.
patthana1.8:26.1: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— pītisahagate khandhe paṭicca sukhasahagatā cetanā.
patthana1.8:28.1: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā …pe…. (Paripuṇṇaṁ, paṭisandhi natthi.)
patthana1.8:29.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— sukhasahagataṁ
patthana1.8:29.1_1: kāyaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:30.1: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—catuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:31.1: (Namaggapaccayā nahetupaccayasadisaṁ. Moho natthi. Navippayuttapaccayā paripuṇṇaṁ, arūpapañhameva.)
patthana1.8:32.1: Nahetuyā dasa, naadhipatiyā dasa, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke dasa, najhāne dve, namagge dasa, navippayutte dasa. (Paccanīyaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
patthana1.8:34.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā dasa, napurejāte dasa, napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke navippayutte dasa.
patthana1.8:36.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dasa, anantare dasa, samanantare dasa, sahajāte aññamaññe
patthana1.8:36.1_1: nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne sabbe dasa,
patthana1.8:36.1_2: magge ekaṁ, sampayutte dasa, vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbe dasa.
patthana1.8:39.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatā
patthana1.8:39.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā
patthana1.8:40.1: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.8:41.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana1.8:41.1_1: paccayo—pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ
patthana1.8:42.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa …pe… pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe… pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa …pe…. (Sukhamūle tīṇi.)
patthana1.8:43.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— upekkhāsahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.8:44.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe… sukhasahagatassa
patthana1.8:44.1_1: dhammassa …pe… pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatā
patthana1.8:44.1_2: ca sukhasahagatā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ
patthana1.8:45.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena
patthana1.8:45.1_1: cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena cittena
patthana1.8:45.1_2: paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.8:45.1_3: taṁ pītisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati. Ariyā pītisahagatena cittena pītisahagate
patthana1.8:45.1_4: pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe
patthana1.8:45.1_5: kilese jānanti. Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.8:45.1_6: vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti; taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
patthana1.8:45.1_7: uppajjati. Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:46.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena
patthana1.8:46.1_1: cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ sukhasahagatena cittena
patthana1.8:46.1_2: paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.8:46.1_3: taṁ sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati. Ariyā sukhasahagatena cittena pītisahagate
patthana1.8:46.1_4: pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe
patthana1.8:46.1_5: kilese jānanti. Pītisahagate khandhe sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.8:46.1_6: vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti; taṁ ārabbha sukhasahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
patthana1.8:46.1_7: uppajjati. Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha sukhasahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:47.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena
patthana1.8:47.1_1: cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena
patthana1.8:47.1_2: cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.8:47.1_3: taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati. Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena cittena pītisahagate
patthana1.8:47.1_4: pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe
patthana1.8:47.1_5: kilese jānanti. Pītisahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato
patthana1.8:47.1_6: anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti; taṁ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.8:47.1_7: diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati. Cetopariyañāṇena pītisahagatacittasamaṅgissa
patthana1.8:47.1_8: cittaṁ jānanti, pītisahagatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.8:47.1_9: yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagate
patthana1.8:48.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana1.8:48.1_1: paccayo—pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā
patthana1.8:48.1_2: taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā
patthana1.8:48.1_3: vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena
patthana1.8:48.1_4: ca cittena paccavekkhati. Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena pītisahagate
patthana1.8:48.1_5: pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe
patthana1.8:48.1_6: kilese jānanti. Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena
patthana1.8:48.1_7: aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti; taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato
patthana1.8:48.1_8: ca sukhasahagato ca rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha
patthana1.8:48.1_9: pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:49.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sukhasahagato
patthana1.8:49.1_1: dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe… upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa …pe… pītisahagatassa
patthana1.8:49.1_2: ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—sukhasahagate khandhe
patthana1.8:49.1_3: ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:50.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— upekkhāsahagatena
patthana1.8:50.1_1: cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena
patthana1.8:50.1_2: cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhāsahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā
patthana1.8:50.1_3: vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati. Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena
patthana1.8:50.1_4: cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.8:50.1_5: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Upekkhāsahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena
patthana1.8:50.1_6: aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti; taṁ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato
patthana1.8:50.1_7: rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati. Cetopariyañāṇena
patthana1.8:50.1_10: paccayo. Upekkhāsahagatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.8:50.1_11: yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Upekkhāsahagate
patthana1.8:51.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe… sukhasahagatassa dhammassa
patthana1.8:51.1_1: …pe… pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—upekkhāsahagatena
patthana1.8:51.1_2: cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca
patthana1.8:51.1_3: sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhāsahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā
patthana1.8:51.1_4: vuṭṭhahitvā phalā vuṭṭhahitvā, taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:51.1_5: Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese
patthana1.8:51.1_6: paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:51.1_7: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato
patthana1.8:51.1_8: anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti; taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato
patthana1.8:51.1_9: ca rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Upekkhāsahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā
patthana1.8:52.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe… sukhasahagatassa
patthana1.8:52.1_2: ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā
patthana1.8:52.1_3: …pe… pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato
patthana1.8:52.1_4: dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati; taṁ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo
patthana1.8:52.1_5: uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati. Cetopariyañāṇena
patthana1.8:52.1_6: pītisahagatasukhasahagatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti. Pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā
patthana1.8:52.1_7: ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa,
patthana1.8:52.1_8: āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe ārabbha
patthana1.8:53.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:54.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:54.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā
patthana1.8:54.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā pītisahagatena cittena taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā
patthana1.8:54.1_3: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā pītisahagatena cittena taṁ
patthana1.8:54.1_4: garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena garuṁ katvā
patthana1.8:54.1_5: assādeti abhinandati; taṁ garuṁ katvā pītisahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:55.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:55.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā …pe…. Sahajātādhipati—pītisahagatādhipati
patthana1.8:56.1: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā …pe… upekkhāsahagatena cittena. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:57.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.8:58.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:58.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā …pe…. Sahajātādhipati—sukhasahagatādhipati
patthana1.8:59.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:60.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:61.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.8:61.1_2: sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:62.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:63.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:64.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:65.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:66.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.8:66.1_2: ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:67.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.8:67.1_2: ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:68.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:69.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.8:69.1_2: ca sukhasahagatā ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca
patthana1.8:70.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā
patthana1.8:70.1_1: pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena
patthana1.8:70.1_2: paccayo. Pītisahagataṁ anulomaṁ gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Iminā kāraṇena
patthana1.8:70.1_3: sabbesaṁ padānaṁ paccayoti dīpetabbo.) Anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ
patthana1.8:70.1_4: maggassa … maggo phalassa … phalaṁ phalassa … anulomaṁ pītisahagatāya phalasamāpattiyā
patthana1.8:71.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.8:71.1_1: purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena
patthana1.8:71.1_2: paccayo. Pītisahagataṁ anulomaṁ sukhasahagatassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:71.1_3: Pītisahagataṁ anulomaṁ sukhasahagatassa vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:72.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:72.1_1: cuticittaṁ upekkhāsahagatassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:72.1_2: bhavaṅgaṁ āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagatā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
patthana1.8:72.1_3: kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagataṁ bhavaṅgaṁ upekkhāsahagatassa
patthana1.8:72.1_4: bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagataṁ kusalākusalaṁ upekkhāsahagatassa
patthana1.8:72.1_5: vuṭṭhānassa … kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa … phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:73.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena
patthana1.8:73.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānañca
patthana1.8:73.1_2: sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Pītisahagataṁ anulomaṁ pītisahagatassa
patthana1.8:73.1_3: ca sukhasahagatassa ca gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo …pe… pītisahagataṁ anulomaṁ
patthana1.8:73.1_4: pītisahagatāya ca sukhasahagatāya ca phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:74.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.8:74.1_1: purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.8:74.1_2: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sukhasahagataṁ anulomaṁ sukhasahagatassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena
patthana1.8:74.1_3: paccayo …pe… sukhasahagataṁ anulomaṁ sukhasahagatāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:75.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.8:75.1_1: purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena
patthana1.8:75.1_2: paccayo …pe… sukhasahagataṁ anulomaṁ pītisahagatāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:76.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— sukhasahagataṁ
patthana1.8:76.1_1: cuticittaṁ upekkhāsahagatassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sukhasahagataṁ
patthana1.8:76.1_2: bhavaṅgaṁ āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sukhasahagataṁ kāyaviññāṇaṁ vipākamanodhātuyā
patthana1.8:76.1_4: anantarapaccayena paccayo sukhasahagataṁ bhavaṅgaṁ upekkhāsahagatassa bhavaṅgassa
patthana1.8:76.1_5: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sukhasahagataṁ kusalākusalaṁ upekkhāsahagatassa vuṭṭhānassa
patthana1.8:76.1_6: … kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa … phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:77.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena
patthana1.8:77.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānañca
patthana1.8:77.1_2: sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo …pe… sukhasahagataṁ anulomaṁ
patthana1.8:77.1_3: pītisahagatāya ca sukhasahagatāya ca phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:78.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.8:78.1_1: purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ upekkhāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.8:78.1_2: …pe… āvajjanā pañcannaṁ viññāṇānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Upekkhāsahagataṁ anulomaṁ
patthana1.8:79.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— upekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana1.8:79.1_1: cuticittaṁ pītisahagatassa upapatticittassa …pe… āvajjanā pītisahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.8:79.1_3: bhavaṅgaṁ pītisahagatassa bhavaṅgassa …pe… upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalākusalaṁ pītisahagatassa
patthana1.8:79.1_4: vuṭṭhānassa … kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa … phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa … nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
patthana1.8:80.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa …pe… pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:82.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe… sukhasahagatassa
patthana1.8:82.1_3: sukhasahagatañca bhavaṅgaṁ āvajjanāya …pe… pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
patthana1.8:82.1_6: vuṭṭhānassa … kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa … phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:83.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.8:83.1_1: anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā
patthana1.8:83.1_2: pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ …pe… pītisahagatañca
patthana1.8:83.1_3: sukhasahagatañca anulomaṁ pītisahagatāya ca sukhasahagatāya ca phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:84.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarapaccayasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.8:85.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagato
patthana1.8:85.1_1: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā dvinnaṁ
patthana1.8:85.1_2: khandhānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Paṭiccasadisaṁ sahajāte dasa pañhā.)
patthana1.8:86.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo. (Dasa pañhā kātabbā.)
patthana1.8:87.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.8:87.1_2: pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:87.1_3: jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ uppādeti, maggaṁ uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ
patthana1.8:87.1_4: jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Pītisahagataṁ sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgaṁ … paññaṁ upanissāya
patthana1.8:87.1_5: pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati …pe… mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.8:87.1_6: Pītisahagataṁ rāgaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ … diṭṭhiṁ … patthanaṁ upanissāya pītisahagatena
patthana1.8:87.1_7: cittena dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, pītisahagataṁ jhānaṁ
patthana1.8:87.1_8: uppādeti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti. Pītisahagatena cittena adinnaṁ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati,
patthana1.8:87.1_9: pisuṇaṁ bhaṇati, samphaṁ palapati, sandhiṁ chindati, nillopaṁ harati, ekāgārikaṁ
patthana1.8:87.1_10: karoti, paripanthe tiṭṭhati, paradāraṁ gacchati, gāmaghātaṁ karoti, nigamaghātaṁ
patthana1.8:87.1_11: karoti. Pītisahagatā saddhā … sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgo … paññā … rāgo … moho … māno …
patthana1.8:87.1_12: diṭṭhi … patthanā pītisahagatāya saddhāya … sīlassa … sutassa … cāgassa … paññāya
patthana1.8:87.1_13: … rāgassa … mohassa … mānassa … diṭṭhiyā … patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:88.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.8:88.1_2: sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ
patthana1.8:88.1_3: gaṇhāti. Pītisahagataṁ sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgaṁ … paññaṁ … rāgaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ … diṭṭhiṁ
patthana1.8:88.1_4: … patthanaṁ upanissāya sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti.
patthana1.8:88.1_5: Sukhasahagatena cittena adinnaṁ ādiyati …pe… nigamaghātaṁ karoti. Pītisahagatā saddhā
patthana1.8:88.1_6: …pe… patthanā sukhasahagatāya saddhāya …pe… patthanāya sukhasahagatassa kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.8:89.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.8:89.1_2: upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… abhiññaṁ uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti,
patthana1.8:89.1_3: mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Pītisahagataṁ sīlaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ upanissāya upekkhāsahagatena
patthana1.8:89.1_4: cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… nigamaghātaṁ karoti. Pītisahagatā saddhā …pe… patthanā upekkhāsahagatāya
patthana1.8:90.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.8:90.1_2: saddhaṁ upanissāya pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… diṭṭhiṁ
patthana1.8:90.1_3: gaṇhāti. Pītisahagataṁ sīlaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ upanissāya pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena

patthana1.8:137.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.8:139.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:140.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.8:140.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.8:141.1_0: Nahetuyā soḷasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe
patthana1.8:141.1_1: nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre
patthana1.8:141.1_2: naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate
patthana1.8:144.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dasa, naadhipatiyā dasa, naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye
patthana1.8:144.1_1: napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge
patthana1.8:147.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte dasa,
patthana1.8:147.1_1: aññamaññe dasa, nissaye dasa, upanissaye soḷasa, āsevane dasa, kamme soḷasa, vipāke
patthana1.8:147.1_2: dasa, āhāre dasa, indriye dasa, jhāne dasa, magge dasa, sampayutte dasa, atthiyā
patthana1.8:147.1_3: dasa, natthiyā soḷasa, vigate soḷasa, avigate dasa.
